lesson: Dynamic pages automatically include list and item templates for each Wix CMS collection; customizing these pages requires carefully selecting elements and may not always be necessary if the default layout suffices.
The provided GitHub connector is read-only; to record session data, maintain local files and compress them for manual upload.
When using the Wix Studio CMS, avoid adding duplicate or unconfigured datasets; use keyboard shortcuts like Enter to save fields when the Save button is unresponsive.
